item.title: Best Friends (for Life)
item.description: Some of you have asked who the people in the canoe on the top banner are. It's no surprise that one of them is me. The other person is a guy who has been like a brother to me since fifth grade, when I stumbled awkwardly on to the shores of this country, a naive Arab with no clue how to handle this overwhelming America, as it were. He took me under his wing, and attempted (in vain) to teach me the ways of the American schoolboy. Since then, we've been through almost everything together: we've gotten to the point of mutual hatred, we've come to appreciate the man-hug, we got our Eagle Scout badges at the same time and held a joint ceremony, we've SCUBA dived together, and undertaken the most sacred of modern manly bonding rituals: Playing through Halo's Co-op Campaign on Legendary difficulty. He was my inspiration to get better at video games, and sports, and we've been up until 3Â AM countless times arguing the finer points of moral philosophy.
